page.title: 10TREFONEN VILLAGE FETE
page.content:
{TREFONEN VILLAGE FETE }
Every year in the village hall a church fete is held.It's held sometime in July and it's always held on a saturday.The rose queen is crowned then,and the person chosen is someone out of the sunday school.The sunday school has its own stall selling icecream and sweets.There's a raffle with at least eight prizes.There are cake stalls and various other stalls. They always raise at least one_hundred pounds or more. It goes to repair the church roof.The fete starts at 2.00 and finishes about 5.00.The sunday school have a little procession. The old rose queen still wears the crown and hands it over to the new one.The girls all wear long dresses.
